item.title: Trump announces drug-price deal with AstraZeneca
item.description: The pharmaceutical giant is the second company to publicly agree to the Trump’s administration’s push for lower drug prices.

item.title: Trump announces new 100 percent tariffs on China
item.description: President Donald Trump said he is unhappy about China’s “hostile” move to limit access to rare minerals and may cancel an upcoming meeting with Xi Jin...

item.title: Some House GOP lawmakers want to get back to work
item.description: The House has not been in session for several weeks amid the shutdown. Some GOP lawmakers say it’s time for it to return.

item.title: Shutdown cracks, Jay Jones’s texts, Trump’s Gaza deal
item.description: Republicans showed cracks in their messaging around the government shutdown, Attorney General Pam Bondi sparred with senators and other highlights fro...

item.title: Trump eyes a triumphal arch to mark America’s 250th anniversary
item.description: The arch would be constructed across from the Lincoln Memorial, on a small patch of federal land currently occupied by a traffic circle.
